code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Modal,ModalOverlay,ModalContent,ModalHeader,ModalBody,ModalCloseButton,useToast}from'@chakra-ui/react';import PaymentService from'../services/PaymentService';import PricingPlans from'./PricingPlans';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SubscriptionModal=_ref=>{let{isOpen,onClose}=_ref;const[isProcessing,setIsProcessing]=useState(false);const toast=useToast();const handleSelectPlan=async plan=>{try{setIsProcessing(true);await PaymentService.createSubscription(plan.priceId);}catch(error){console.error('Subscription error:',error);toast({title:'Error',description:error.message||'Failed to process subscription',status:'error',duration:5000,isClosable:true});}finally{setIsProcessing(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{isOpen:isOpen,onClose:onClose,size:"6xl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ModalOverlay,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ModalContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ModalHeader,{children:"Choose Your Plan"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ModalCloseButton,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ModalBody,{pb:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PricingPlans,{onSelectPlan:handleSelectPlan,isProcessing:isProcessing})})]})]});};export default SubscriptionModal;
